tool_description: Supports removing various textures (screen lines, moire lines) produced by shooting the screen, restoring clear and realistic images. It is recommended to use in combination with the Enhanced Sharpening Filter.
name: Removal of screen lines and moire lines
title: Removal of screen lines and moire lines
tool_name: Removal of screen lines and moire lines

api_list.name: Removal of screen lines and moire lines
api_list.description: Support jpg, png, BMP, pdf, tiff, single frame gif, etc., image size not more than 10M
